p:
When cellulose @α-Fe2O3–ZrO2 was sequentially used five times for biodiesel production, the yield did not significantly change, decreasing from 92.50 of first cycle to 80.0% of fifth cycle (Figure 11). Decreasing of the product may be caused by deactivation of catalysts by product species adsorption and the unreacted lauric acid onto the surface of catalysts that could block the active sites [50].Figure 11
Nanocomposite reusability.Figure 11
